Reviews.Title: 12v Distribution panel
Reviews.Author: Bingo Bill
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a substitute for transformers, this is a great choice. This unit is small and and looks good attached to the wall. I made this purchase for a 4 camera system after the original equipment transformer overheated and melted, but luckily there was no fire. This unit is enclosed in a metal box and fused at the AC input as well as the individual distributions.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Rudy Rockstar
Reviews.Content: Compact size & works great. Nice rubber inserts to prevent the metal case from cutting wires inserted. Easy to mount. Straight forward manual.

Reviews.Title: Very nice product
Reviews.Author: Sean kuhn
Reviews.Content: This thing is great, works like  a charm. Nice and small compare to other power supplies.... will buy again and again and again
